properties.description: Welcome to our Public Living Room in our reception area at the Town Hall. We have a comfy sofa & chairs, plenty to read, and games to play. Watch the busy life of the Town Hall unfold and join some of the diverse groups and activities taking place here.

properties.address: 46 John William Street, Huddersfield, West Yorkshire HD1 1ER
properties.description: Hive is a warm and inviting cafe and community hub in central Huddersfield, with easy access to transport and parking. Hive not only sells affordable hot drinks and food, but we also support our LGBTQ+ community (teens and adults) as well as been an inviting and open space for those requiring a little support who may be isolated or lonely. All are welcome in our safe space. Hive is a not for profit cafe and community hub. We are a #safespace. The cafe offers Wellbeing Wednesday, with support for a wide range of community members from 9.30am to 3.00pm. Every Wednesday the drinks are complimentary and we gather to enjoy warming soup. The afternoon sees us hosting a range of activities to support people's wellbeing.
properties.title: Hive Cafe and Community Hub

properties.address: Everybody Arts (formerly Artworks), Halifax, West Yorkshire HX3 9ET
properties.description: The Everybody Gallery is part of Everybody Arts: a non profit organisation with learning, wellbeing and studio programmes. We believe that art is for everyone, and should be accessible to all. Our Winter Warmth series launches in November, and gives you the chance to access our spaces and art activities for free throughout Winter. All are welcome, whether you are an existing member of our community or a first time visitor- we have creative activities available for all ages and abilities and will always provide a warm welcome and a hot cuppa. Friday Warm Space Drop-In, 12-3pm 10th Nov- 15th Dec and 12th Jan-29th March Family Winter Warmth Drop In, Saturday 10-12pm 11th Nov, 9th Dec, 13th Jan, 10th Feb, 9th March
properties.title: The Everybody Gallery

properties.description: King's Coffee House is open Monday - Friday 8.30am - 2pm with reasonably priced meals and drinks. A pensioners 3 course meal is available on Monday and Thursday for £5. We have a reception area with tables and chairs people are welcome to use (depending on other room users) and games and a cuppa can be provided. This is open 10am - 2.30pm Mon - Fri.
